src_original: yaḥ pṛthivīdhātor vyayo na sa pṛthivīdhātuḥ,  yo 'bdhātor vyayo na so 'bdhātuḥ,  yas tejodhātor vyayo na sa tejodhātuḥ,  yo vāyudhātor vyayo na sa vāyudhātuḥ,  ya ākāśadhātor vyayo na sa ākāśadhātuḥ,  yo vijñānadhātor vyayo na sa vijñānadhātuḥ.  yo 'vidyāyā vyayo na so 'vidyā,  yaḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vyayo na te saṃskārāḥ,
tgt_original: 地界究竟即非地界，水、火、風、空、識界究竟即非水、火、風、空、識界；

src_original: yo vijñānasya vyayo na tad vijñānaṃ,  yo nāmarūpasya vyayo na tan nāmarūpaṃ,  yaḥ ṣaḍāyatanasya vyayo na tat ṣaḍāyatanaṃ,  yaḥ sparśasya vyayo na sa sparśaḥ,  yo vedanāyā vyayo na sā vedanā,
tgt_original: 無明究竟即非無明，行、識、名色、六處、觸、受、愛、取、有、生、老死愁歎苦憂惱究竟即非行乃至老死愁歎苦憂惱；

src_original: yas tṛṣṇāyā vyayo na sā tṛṣṇā,  ya upādānasya vyayo na tad upādānaṃ,  yo bhavasya vyayo na sa bhavaḥ,  yo jāter vyayo na sā jātiḥ,  yo jarāmaraṇasya vyayo na taj jarāmaraṇam.  yo dānapāramitāyā vyayo na sā dānapāramitā,  yaḥ śīlapāramitāyā vyayo na sā śīlapāramitā,
tgt_original: 布施波羅蜜多究竟即非布施波羅蜜多，淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多究竟即非淨戒乃至般若波羅蜜多；

src_original: yaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vyayo na sā kṣāntipāramitā,  yo vīryapāramitāyā vyayo na sā vīryapāramitā,  yo dhyānapāramitāyā vyayo na sā dhyānapāramitā,  yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā vyayo na sā prajñāpāramitā.  (ŚsP II-2 46)  yo 'dhyātmaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sādhyātmaśūnyatā,  yo bahirdhāśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā bahirdhāśūnyatā,
tgt_original: 內空究竟即非內空，外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空究竟即非外空乃至無性自性空； 真如究竟即非真如，法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界究竟即非法界乃至不思議界；

src_original: yo 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā vyayo na sādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā,  yaḥ śūnyatāśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā śūnyatāśūnyatā,  yo mahāśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā mahāśūnyatā,  yaḥ paramārthaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā paramārthaśūnyatā,  yaḥ saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā,  yo 'saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatā,  yo 'tyantaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sātyantaśūnyatā,  yo 'navarāgraśūnyatāyā vyayo na sānavarāgraśūnyatā,  yo 'navakāraśūnyatāyā vyayo na sānavakāraśūnyatā,
tgt_original: 苦聖諦究竟即非苦聖諦，集、滅、道聖諦究竟即非集、滅、道聖諦；

src_original: yaḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā prakṛtiśūnyatā,  yaḥ sarvadharmaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā sarvadharmaśūnyatā,  yaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā,  yo 'bhāvaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sābhāvaśūnyatā,  yaḥ svabhavaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā svabhāvaśūnyatā,
tgt_original: 四靜慮究竟即非四靜慮，四無量、四無色定究竟即非四無量、四無色定；

src_original: yo 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā.  yaḥ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ vyayo na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni,  yaḥ samyakprahāṇānāṃ vyayo na tāni samyakprahāṇāni,  ya ṛddhipādānāṃ vyayo na ta ṛddhipādāḥ,  ya indriyāṇāṃ vyayo na tānīndriyāṇi,  yo balānāṃ vyayo na tāni balāni,
tgt_original: 八解脫究竟即非八解脫，八勝處、九次第定、十遍處究竟即非八勝處、九次第定、十遍處；

src_original: yo bodhyaṅgānāṃ vyayo na tāni bodhyaṅgāni,  ya āryāṣṭāṅgasya vyayo na sa āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ,  ya āryasatyānāṃ vyayo na tāny āryasatyāni,  yo dhyānānāṃ vyayo na tāni dhyānāni,  yo pramāṇānāṃ vyayo na tāny apramāṇāni,
tgt_original: 四念住究竟即非四念住，四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支究竟即非四正斷乃至八聖道支；

src_original: ya ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ vyayo na tā ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ,  yo vimokṣāṇāṃ vyayo na te vimokṣāḥ,  yo 'nupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ vyayo na tā anupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ,  yaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānāṃ vyayo na tāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni,
tgt_original: 空解脫門究竟即非空解脫門，無相、無願解脫門究竟即非無相、無願解脫門；

src_original: rūpam anutpādaḥ,  vedanām anutpādaḥ,  saṃjñām anutpādaḥ,  saṃskārā anutpādaḥ,  vijñānam anutpādaḥ.
tgt_original: 色無生無滅故，受、想、行、識無生無滅故。

src_original: cakṣur anutpādaḥ,  śrotram anutpādaḥ,  ghrāṇam anutpādaḥ,  jihvānutpādaḥ,  kāyo 'nutpādaḥ,  mano 'nutpādaḥ.
tgt_original: 「世尊！ 眼處無生無滅故，耳、鼻、舌、身、意處無生無滅故。

src_original: rūpam anutpādaḥ,  śabdo 'nutpādaḥ,  gandho 'nutpādaḥ,  raso 'nutpādaḥ,  sparśo 'nutpādaḥ,  dharmā anutpādaḥ.
tgt_original: 「世尊！ 色處無生無滅故，聲、香、味、觸、法處無生無滅故。

src_original: cakṣurvijñānam anutpādaḥ,  śrotravijñānam anutpādaḥ,  ghrāṇavijñānam anutpādaḥ,  jihvāvijñānam anutpādaḥ,
tgt_original: 「世尊！ 眼界無生無滅故，耳、鼻、舌、身、意界無生無滅故。

src_original: kāyavijñānam anutpādaḥ,
tgt_original: 「世尊！ 色界無生無滅故，聲、香、味、觸、法界無生無滅故。 「世尊！

src_original: manovijñānam anutpādaḥ.  cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo 'nutpādaḥ,  śrotrasaṃsparśo 'nutpādaḥ,  ghrāṇasaṃsparśo 'nutpādaḥ,  jihvāsaṃsparśo 'nutpādaḥ,
tgt_original: 眼識界無生無滅故，耳、鼻、舌、身、意識界無生無滅故。

src_original: kāyasaṃsparśo 'nutpādaḥ,  manaḥsaṃsparśo 'nutpādaḥ.
tgt_original: 「世尊！ 眼觸無生無滅故，耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸無生無滅故。 「世尊！

src_original: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanānutpādaḥ,  śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanānutpādaḥ,  ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanānutpādaḥ,  jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanānutpādaḥ (ŚsP II-2 63)
tgt_original: 眼觸為緣所生諸受無生無滅故，耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸為緣所生諸受無生無滅故。

src_original: pṛthivīdhātur anutpādaḥ,  abdhātur anutpādaḥ,  tejodhātur anutpādaḥ,
tgt_original: 地界無生無滅故，水、火、風、空、識界無生無滅故。

src_original: catvāri dhyānāny anutpādaḥ,  catvāry apramāṇāny anutpādaḥ,  catasra ārūpyasamāpattayo 'nutpādaḥ,
tgt_original: 四靜慮無生無滅故，四無量、四無色定無生無滅故。

src_original: aṣṭau vimokṣā anutpādaḥ,  navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayo 'nutpādaḥ,
tgt_original: 「世尊！ 八解脫無生無滅故，八勝處、九次第定、十遍處無生無滅故。

src_original: samādhayo 'nutpādaḥ,
tgt_original: 三摩地門無生無滅故，陀羅尼門無生無滅故。

src_original: rūpam anutpādaḥ śabdo 'nutpādo gandho 'nutpādo raso 'nutpādaḥ sparśo 'nutpādo dharmā anutpādaḥ.
tgt_original: 色界無生無滅故，聲、香、味、觸、法界無生無滅故。

src_original: cakṣurvijñānam anutpādaḥ,  śrotravijñānam anutpādo ghrāṇavijñānam anutpādo jihvāvijñānam anutpādaḥ kāyavijñānam anutpādo manovijñānam anutpādaḥ.
tgt_original: 「世尊！ 眼識界無生無滅故，耳、鼻、舌、身、意識界無生無滅故。

src_original: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo 'nutpādaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśo 'nutpādo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo 'nutpādo jihvāsaṃsparśo 'nutpādaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo 'nutpādo manaḥsaṃsparśo 'nutpādaḥ.
tgt_original: 「世尊！ 眼觸無生無滅故，耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸無生無滅故。

src_original: jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanānutpādaḥ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanānutpādo manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanānutpādaḥ.
tgt_original: 眼觸為緣所生諸受無生無滅故，耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸為緣所生諸受無生無滅故。

src_original: pṛthivīdhātur anutpādo 'bdhātur anutpādaḥ tejodhātur anutpādo vāyudhātur anutpāda ākāśadhātur anutpādo vijñānadhātur anutpādaḥ.
tgt_original: 「世尊！ 地界無生無滅故，水、火、風、空、識界無生無滅故。

src_original: jātir anutpādo jarāmaraṇam anutpādaḥ.
tgt_original: 無明無生無滅故，行、識、名色、六處、觸、受、愛、取、有、生、老死無生無滅故。

src_original: dānapāramitānutpādaḥ śīlapāramitānutpādaḥ kṣāntipāramitānutpādo vīryapāramitānutpādo dhyānapāramitānutpādaḥ prajñāpāramitānutpādaḥ.
tgt_original: 「世尊！ 布施波羅蜜多無生無滅故，淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多無生無滅故。 「世尊！

src_original: adhyātmaśūnyatānutpādo bahirdhāśūnyatānutpādo 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatānutpādaḥ śūnyatāśūnyatānutpādo  mahāśūnyatānutpādaḥ paramārthaśūnyatānutpādaḥ saṃskṛtaśūnyatānutpādo 'saṃskṛtaśūnyatānutpādo  'tyantaśūnyatānutpādo 'navarāgraśūnyatānutpādo 'navakāraśūnyatānutpādaḥ prakṛtiśūnyatānutpādaḥ  sarvadharmaśūnyatānutpādaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatānutpādo 'nupalambhaśūnyatānutpādo (ŚsP II-2 65)
tgt_original: 內空無生無滅故，外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空無生無滅故。

src_original: 'bhāvaśūnyatānutpādaḥ svabhāvaśūnyatānutpādo 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatānutpādaḥ.
tgt_original: 「世尊！ 真如無生無滅故，法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界無生無滅故。 「世尊！

src_original: smṛtyupasthānāny anutpādaḥ samyakprahāṇāny anutpāda ṛddhipādā anutpādaḥ indriyāṇy
tgt_original: 四念住無生無滅故，四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支無生無滅故。 「世尊！

src_original: anutpādo balāny anutpādo bodhyaṅgāny anutpāda āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo 'nutpāda āryasatyāny
tgt_original: 苦聖諦無生無滅故，集、滅、道聖諦無生無滅故。 「世尊！

src_original: anutpādaś catvāri dhyānāny anutpādaś catvāry apramāṇāny anutpāda catasra ārūpyasamāpattayo
tgt_original: 四靜慮無生無滅故，四無量、四無色定無生無滅故。 「世尊！

src_original: 'nutpādo aṣṭau vimokṣānutpādo navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayo 'nutpādaḥ,
tgt_original: 八解脫無生無滅故，八勝處、九次第定、十遍處無生無滅故。

src_original: na khalu punar iha dharmadeśanāyāṃ cakṣuḥ prajñapitaṃ,
tgt_original: 非眼處究竟中有如是分別，謂此是眼處；

src_original: na śrotraṃ prajñapitaṃ,  na ghrāṇaṃ prajñapitaṃ,  na jihvā prajñapitā,  na kāyaḥ prajñapitaḥ,  na manaḥ prajñapitam.
tgt_original: 亦非耳、鼻、舌、身、意處究竟中有如是分別，謂此是耳、鼻、舌、身、意處。

src_original: na khalu punar iha dharmadeśanāyāṃ rūpaṃ prajñapitaṃ,
tgt_original: 「世尊！ 非色處究竟中有如是分別，謂此是色處；

src_original: na śabdaḥ prajñapitaḥ,  na gandhaḥ prajñapitaḥ,  na rasaḥ prajñapitaḥ,  na sparśaḥ prajñapitaḥ,  na dharmāḥ prajñapitāḥ,
tgt_original: 亦非聲、香、味、觸、法處究竟中有如是分別，謂此是聲、香、味、觸、法處。 「世尊！

src_original: na khalu punar iha dharmadeśanāyāṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ prajñapitaṃ,
tgt_original: 非眼界究竟中有如是分別，謂此是眼界；

src_original: bodhyaṅgeṣu na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  āryāṣṭāṅge marge na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 不應住八解脫，亦不應住八勝處、九次第定、十遍處；

src_original: āryasatyeṣu na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  dhyāneṣu na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  apramāṇeṣu na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  ārūpyasamāpattiṣu na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  vimokṣeṣu na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  navānupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 不應住四念住，亦不應住四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支；

src_original: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukheṣu na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 不應住空解脫門，亦不應住無相、無願解脫門；

src_original: āveṇikabuddhadharmeṣu na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  śrāvakayāne na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  pratyekabuddhayāne na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  buddhayāne na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 不應住佛十力，亦不應住四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法；

src_original: abhijñāsu na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  samādhiṣu na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  dhāraṇīmukheṣu na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  tathāgatabaleṣu na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  vaiśāradyeṣu na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  pratisaṃvitsu na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  mahāmaitryāṃ na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  mahākaruṇāyāṃ na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 不應住五眼，亦不應住六神通；

src_original: srotaāpattiphale na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  sakṛdāgāmiphale na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 不應住無忘失法，亦不應住恒住捨性；

src_original: anāgāmiphale na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  arhatphale na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  pratyekabuddhatve na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  sarvajñatāyāṃ na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 不應住一切智，亦不應住道相智、一切相智； 不應住一切陀羅尼門，亦不應住一切三摩地門； 不應住預流果，亦不應住一來、不還、阿羅漢果；

src_original: na vedanā prajñapitā,  na saṃjñā prajñapitā,  na saṃskārā prajñapitāḥ,  na vijñānaṃ prajñapitam.
tgt_original: 無受、想、行、識，無受、想、行、識施設。

src_original: na khalu punar iha dharmadeśanāyāṃ cakṣuḥ prajñapitaṃ,
tgt_original: 無眼處，無眼處施設；

src_original: na śrotraṃ prajñapitaṃ,  na ghrāṇaṃ prajñapitaṃ,  na jihvā prajñapitā,  na kāyaḥ prajñapitaḥ,  na manaḥ prajñapitam.
tgt_original: 無耳、鼻、舌、身、意處，無耳、鼻、舌、身、意處施設。

src_original: na khalu punar iha dharmadeśanāyāṃ rūpaṃ prajñapitaṃ,
tgt_original: 無色處，無色處施設；

src_original: na śabdaḥ prajñapitaḥ,  na gandhaḥ prajñapitaḥ,  na rasaḥ prajñapitaḥ,  na sparśaḥ prajñapitaḥ,  na dharmāḥ prajñapitāḥ,
tgt_original: 無聲、香、味、觸、法處，無聲、香、味、觸、法處施設。

src_original: na khalu punar iha dharmadeśanāyāṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ prajñapitaṃ,
tgt_original: 無眼界，無眼界施設；

src_original: na śrotravijñānaṃ prajñapitaṃ,  na ghrāṇavijñānaṃ prajñapitaṃ,  na jihvāvijñānaṃ (ŚsP II-2 192)
tgt_original: 無耳、鼻、舌、身、意界，無耳、鼻、舌、身、意界施設。

src_original: na kāyavijñānaṃ prajñapitaṃ,  na manovijñānaṃ prajñapitam.
tgt_original: 無色界，無色界施設；

src_original: na khalu punar iha dharmadeśanāyāṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ prajñapitaḥ,
tgt_original: 無聲、香、味、觸、法界，無聲、香、味、觸、法界施設。 無眼識界，無眼識界施設；

src_original: na śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ prajñapitaḥ,  na ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ prajñapitaḥ,  na jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ prajñapitaḥ,  na kāyasaṃsparśaḥ prajñapitaḥ,
tgt_original: 無耳、鼻、舌、身、意識界，無耳、鼻、舌、身、意識界施設。

src_original: na manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ prajñapitaḥ.  na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā prajñapitā,  na śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā prajñapitā,
tgt_original: 無眼觸，無眼觸施設； 無耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸，無耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸施設。
